text: Nurur Rahman was a Member of the 2nd National Assembly of Pakistan as a representative of East Pakistan. ==Career== Rahman was a Member of the 2nd National Assembly of Pakistan. He joined Bangladesh Nationalist Party and served as its treasurer after the Independence of Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Pakistani MNAs 1955–1958 Category:Living people Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Nurur Rahman
